name: Monster Tour Guide
description:
This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020!

In this game you take place as a worker who's job is to transfer dangerous monsters from one enclosure to the next, but the only way to do it is by letting them free, and luring them into the new one! To fit along with the theme, I noticed that in many games the enemies are very consistent, meaning that in one way or another, it gives the player control over the level and those enemies. In this I wanted to take away some of that consistency or control from the enemies.

To jump to any of the 7 levels, press any of the corresponding numbers on your keyboard.
